verb.comment: EGYPTIAN ARABIC Framefile based on jAr-u

example.parse: (TOP (S (S (CONJ لَكِن) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART مِش)) (PRT (FUT_PART هَ)) (IV1S+IV اظْلِم) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)))) (CONJ وَ) (S (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لَنْ)) (IV1S+IV اجُور) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP عَلَى) (NP (NOUN حَقّ) (NP (NOUN أَحَد))))))))
